title: Data Management in Machine Learning Systems
abstract: Abstract Large-scale data analytics using machine learning (ML) underpins many modern data-driven applications. ML systems provide means of specifying and executing these ML workloads in an efficie...
tldr: This paper discusses the critical role of data management in machine learning systems, highlighting how effective data handling is essential for executing large-scale ML workloads in modern data-driven applications, ensuring efficiency and performance.
